title: AdaCore and CodeSecure Merge to Form a Global Company Providing Embedded Software Security and Safety Solutions
summary: NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--AdaCore, which provides software development tools for mission-critical systems, and embedded software security company CodeSecure, today announced a definitive merger agreement. The merger creates a unified company committed to advancing software safety, security, and reliability across critical industries.
